Create Virtual Species Suitability SpatRaster for Target State

state_target_suitability_virtsp.Rd

Create Virtual Species Suitability SpatRaster for Target State

Usage

state_target_suitability_virtsp(
  simulation_object,
  n_targets = 1,
  params = NULL
)

Arguments

simulation_object

A SimulationObject containing the background and environmental layers.

n_targets

The number of target layers. Default is 1.

params

A list of parameters for generating virtual species. Default is NULL.

Value

A SimulationObject with updated target suitability layers.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
sim_object <- state_target_suitability_virtsp(simulation_object, n_targets = 2)
} # }
